mapper.update: update user_limit set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, limit_browse = #{limitBrowse,jdbcType=TINYINT}, limit_message = #{limitMessage,jdbcType=TINYINT}, limit_fapply = #{limitFapply,jdbcType=TINYINT}, limit_dapply = #{limitDapply,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userid, limit_browse, limit_message, limit_fapply, limit_dapply from user_limit
